objects.name: Analytic 0722
objects.description: SaaS platforms may show forged credentials as unusual API keys, tokens, or session cookies being used without corresponding authentication. Correlated patterns include simultaneous valid sessions from multiple geographies, unusual API calls with new tokens, or bypass of expected MFA enforcement.

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: m365:unified
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Session creation without MFA or login event

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: saas:auth
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: API requests made with tokens not associated with expected user logins

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Trigger on logins from unusual or high-risk geographies.
Detect multiple simultaneous uses of the same forged credential.
